metadata.title: CVE-2021-3826 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Heap/stack buffer overflow in the dlang_lname function in d-demangle.c inlibiberty allows attackers to potentially cause a denial of service(segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted mangled symbol.

criterions.comment: gcc-3.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
